com.github.wuic.configuration
Interface DomConfigurationBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpriteConfiguratonDomBuilder, YuiCssConfigurationDomBuilder, YuiJavascriptConfigurationDomBuilder
public interface DomConfigurationBuilder

This interface represents a builder that can produce a Configuration using a configuration Node read from the 'wuic.xml' file.

Since:
0.1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

Method Summary
 Configuration build(Node nodeConfiguration, Cache cache)
           Builds a Configuration using the given DOM element.
 

Method Detail

build

Configuration build(Node nodeConfiguration,
                    Cache cache)
                    throws BadConfigurationException

Builds a Configuration using the given DOM element.

Parameters:
nodeConfiguration - the DOM element
cache - the cache
Returns:
the built configuration
Throws:
BadConfigurationException - if the node does not represents the expected configuration
